alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 10:46AM CST until December 26 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Patchy blowing snow possible later tonight. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of snow will move in early this afternoon, possibly come to an end early this evening then see stronger winds and patchy blowing snow later tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
